sub_title: Freelance Project Manager, experienced in the packaging industry, available for dynamic, challenging and high-risk opportunities.

treasury_media.title: An impression of Rob Peeters' projects
treasury_media.description: For more information about the projects I've worked on, please refer to the project section of my profile!

projects.title: Etteplan
projects.description:
Since July 2021, I've been carrying out an assignment for Etteplan. As a member of the Etteplan-team, I support one of their clients in redesigning the factory lay-out in order to ensure they can accommodate the steep growth in production volumes.

Our focus is to increase the output of this factory and to ensure it is capable of dealing with future challenges. We are not only designing and delivering hardware, but we are also actively supporting this client with the introduction of a new way of working.

contributors.headline: Freelance Project Manager, experienced in the packaging industry, available for dynamic, challenging and high-risk opportunities.

projects.title: PDM Group
projects.description: PDM helps high-tech production companies and manufacturing industries to optimize their production environments and develop manufacturing technology for advanced engineering. As a project leader, I am responsible for overseeing the development process for one of their most profound clients, to assist in the production of new machinery.

contributors.headline: Freelance Project Manager, experienced in the packaging industry, available for dynamic, challenging and high-risk opportunities.

projects.title: MI Partners Eindhoven
projects.description: In this project, I fulfilled the role of Logistics Manager. My portfolio included the purchase of industrial packaging, as well as the cleaning and packaging of high-quality modules and other parts that are used in a clean room. My tasks included organizing transport and storage of the relevant modules and parts, to and from MI Partners’s customers.

contributors.headline: Freelance Project Manager, experienced in the packaging industry, available for dynamic, challenging and high-risk opportunities.

projects.title: Amperum BV Roermond
projects.description: Amperum is a fast growing company in the area of solar energy. They focus on the B2B-market and so-called ‘Postcode roos’ projects. I supported Amperum as a consultant in the field of Contract & Project Management and the realisations of some of their projects.

contributors.headline: Freelance Project Manager, experienced in the packaging industry, available for dynamic, challenging and high-risk opportunities.

projects.title: Eco Latch Systems LLC, Wisconsin USA
projects.description: Eco Latch Systems is an American company that aims to sell its products for the packaging industry on the European market. My role was to give advice on setting up a European sales and distribution network. This meant giving advice on concluding agreements with agents, distributors, internationally oriented transport companies and adjust the company’s structure to comply with European standards and legislation. Furthermore, I supported customers in using ELS’ products.

contributors.headline: Freelance Project Manager, experienced in the packaging industry, available for dynamic, challenging and high-risk opportunities.

projects.title: Rechtbank Midden Nederland
projects.description: In May 2018, I supported the local court as a witness expert. Two parties had a conflict about reassembling a packaging line that was stored in containers. I was asked to build upon my expertise in the packaging industry to help the court decide whether the buying or selling party should win the case. On the contrary, I mediated and succeeded in convincing both parties that they'd be better off when settling the case.

contributors.headline: Freelance Project Manager, experienced in the packaging industry, available for dynamic, challenging and high-risk opportunities.

projects.title: Marel Stork Poultry Processing
projects.description: The focus for this Project was to develop and industrialise 20 modules of a 'Live Bird Handling System'. This system aims to empty and clean containers which are used to ship poultry from farmers to a slaughterhouse. For some of the modules, I was involved at starting the feasibility phase, for other modules in the early development stage, up and until the particular modules were released for production. My work included managing the manufacturing of the running orders in this '0-Series Stage' as well, in order to guarantee a timely delivery to customers. To do so, we set up a temporary manufacturing facility in the near vicinity of the Marel plant.

contributors.headline: Freelance Project Manager, experienced in the packaging industry, available for dynamic, challenging and high-risk opportunities.

projects.title: Heinz Company
projects.description: The goal of this project was to increase the output of the production line TK2. By replacing and revising  the machines in this production line by november 2016, it became possible to fill four different bottle sizes with Heinz' well-know ketchup. My main responsibilities during this project was to coordinate the project, in collaboration with the engineering. production and quality departments. In the end, the targeted production growth was reached, while maintaining the required quality and staying within budget.

contributors.headline: Freelance Project Manager, experienced in the packaging industry, available for dynamic, challenging and high-risk opportunities.

projects.title: Yamaha Motor IM
projects.description: Yamaha supplies machines for the production of electronic devices such as ‘pick-and-place’ machines, screen printers, and optical inspection machines. The project included setting up a training program and writing course materials for Yamaha engineers, such that they can train new users to safely handle the equipment.

contributors.headline: Freelance Project Manager, experienced in the packaging industry, available for dynamic, challenging and high-risk opportunities.

projects.title: Marel Stork Poultry Processing
projects.description: In this project, we set up an assembly line to ensure the delivery of 400 stacks or 2000 containers. The containers are used to collect poultry at the farmer and transport the livestock to a slaughterhouse. The main challenge was setting up a hall in 10 weeks, making sure all parts were delivered and the containers were assembled in time. About 20 temporary employees were hired to work on this project. The promised delivery time was met and all containers were ready for use in time.

contributors.headline: Freelance Project Manager, experienced in the packaging industry, available for dynamic, challenging and high-risk opportunities.

projects.title: Usuaia Beach Hotel Ibiza
projects.description: Project managment support, installation support and commisioning of 11 led displays at Ushuaia Beach Hotel Ibiza

contributors.headline: Freelance Project Manager, experienced in the packaging industry, available for dynamic, challenging and high-risk opportunities.

profile_positions.description: As an independent Project Manager, I've worked for (amongst others) Marel Stork Poultry Processing BV, Heinz (Elst, Gelderland). Yamaha Motor IM GmbH, Eco Latch Systems USA and MI Partners. For more information about these projects, please check the project section of my profile.
profile_positions.title: Freelance Project Manager

profile_positions.description: Bosch Weert designs, builds and sells 'vertical packaging machines'. Often, these are often custom made machines and are sold as a part of a complete packaging line. As a Project Manager, it was my responsibility to oversee the process and to integrate Bosch' machinery into a packaging line along with third party equipment, including in-feed and out-feed conveyors, multi-head weighers, check weighers, metal detectors and case packers. At Bosch, I worked for various clients, like Mondelez, Unilever and Nestlé Purina. I further re-strengthened my skills in contract and claim management, risk management and cost control, and FAT & SAT.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description: At VDL ETG, I worked as a Project Manager at the New Product Introduction and Organization (NPI&O) department. The goal of these projects which I managed was to introduce prototypes in a factory for parts manufacturing and mechatronic systems. At VDL ETG, I learned how to apply the QLTC method and was introduced to parts manufacturing used in a clean room environment.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description: As a Project Manager at the Turnkey Projects & Services (TP&S) department of Philips Lighting, I worked on a wide variety of projects, all related to those dealing with LED technology. Examples include the installation of electronic billboards in sport stadiums, the installation of adaptive and solar powered urban lighting and the illumination of buildings. During my time at Philips Lighting, I gained more experience in analysing force fields, contract and claim management and export control.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
The projects which I carried out at Assembléon focussed on delivering machines and production lines for manufacturing printed circuit boards. Besides keeping track of time, cost and risk, my main task was to manage the relationship with customers.

Two projects from this period of my career have stayed with me in particular. My collaborations with Ericsson in Kumla in Sweden and Jabil in “T-Town” in Hungary have been especially gratifying. Both customers were of Key Importance to Assembléon due to their application and highly demanding production requirements. Establishing a long term partnership between Assembléon and these two factories is a result I am very satisfied with.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager at Customer Support Operations
